newsitem.title: DENMARK: FORECAST - Jyske Bank 1996 profit seen up. [CORRECTED 14:28 GMT]
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Jyske Bank 1996 profit seen up. [CORRECTED 14:28 GMT]

text.p: Analysts polled by Reuters in a survey released on Tuesday forecast on average modestly higher full year 1996 pre-tax profits for Denmark's fourth biggest bank Jyske Bank.

Eight international and domestic analysts forecast average profits before tax and extraordinary items of 1.034 billion (corrects from 985 million) crowns for Jyske Bank in 1996, compared to 961 million crowns in the previous year.
Jyske Bank is due to announce its 1996 results on Thursday February 20.
Last October, Jyske Bank posted group pre-tax and extraordinary items profits of 820 million crowns for the first nine months of 1996, compared to the same 1995 period's 723 million crown surplus.
At that time it said it expected whole year 1996 profits before tax, extraordinary items and currency and security adjustments in the 650-750 million crown range.
